definition[0]: to stop a candle burning by pressing the burning part with your fingers or by covering it
definition[1]: if an animal snuffs, it breathes air into its nose in a noisy way, especially in order to smell something
definition[2]: a type of tobacco in powder form, which people breathe in through their noses
example[0]: He took a pinch of snuff.
example[1]: a snuff box  (=a small box used to keep snuff in)
